roleset.name: push down underneath

example.name: subduct-v
example.text: Over time , the central part of the Farallon Plate was completely subducted under the southwestern part of the North American Plate .

propbank.arg: the central part of the Farallon Plate
under the southwestern part of the North American Plate

example.name: subduct-v
example.text: The topography below shows the Indian plate , streaked by hotspot traces and healed transforms , subducting at the Javan Trench .

propbank.arg: the Indian plate , streaked by hotspot traces and healed transforms

example.name: subduction-n
example.text: The subduction of continental crust to this depth has never been reported in the Himalayas and is also extremely rare in the rest of world ,

roleset.note: SUBDUCT-V, SUBDUCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
